Method.name: recPaciente
Method.Implementation:
set codPaciente = $get(%request.Data("codPaciente",1)) if (codPaciente = "") set codPaciente = 0 set obj = $get(^MEDPatient(0,codPaciente,1)) set name = $$$MEDPatientName(obj) set sexo = $$$MEDPatientGender(obj) set dtNascimento = $$$MEDPatientDOB(obj) set cpf = $$$MEDPatientSSN(obj) set rg = $$$MEDPatientFREE7(obj) set cns = $$$MEDPatientExternalCode(obj) set alergias = $$$MEDPatientAllergies(obj) set prontuario = $$$MEDPatientPID(obj) set naoInformada = $$$MEDPatientFREE1(obj) set obito = $$$MEDPatientFREE9(obj) set nomeMae = $$$MEDPatientMothersName(obj) set dataMae = $$$MEDPatientMothersDOB(obj) set telefone1 = $$$MEDPatientTel(obj) set telefone2 = $$$MEDPatientFREE2(obj) set perdaContato = $$$MEDPatientFREE8(obj) set email = $$$MEDPatientEmail(obj) set logradouro = $$$MEDPatientStreet(obj) set numero = $$$MEDPatientFREE4(obj) set complemento = $$$MEDPatientFREE3(obj) set bairro = $$$MEDPatientFREE6(obj) set cep = $$$MEDPatientZipCode(obj) set cidade = $$$MEDPatientCity(obj) set uf = $$$MEDPatientState(obj) set medicoResp = $$$MEDPatientMedicoResponsavel(obj) ; set criadoEm = $$$MEDPatientCreatedDate(obj) set criadoPor = $$$MEDPatientCreatedBy(obj) set alteradoEm = $$$MEDPatientChangedDate(obj) set alteradoPor = $$$MEDPatientChangedBy(obj)
; set geral = {} set geral.Nome = name set geral.DataDeNascimento = $select(dtNascimento'="":$zdate(dtNascimento,3),1:"") set geral.Sexo = sexo set geral.Alergias = alergias set geral.Prontuário = prontuario set geral.NomeDaMãe = nomeMae set geral.DataDeNasc = $select(dataMae="":"",1:$zd(dataMae,3)) set geral.CPF = cpf set geral.RG = rg set geral.CNS = cns set geral.Telefone1 = telefone1 set geral.Telefone2 = telefone2 set geral.PerdaDeContato = perdaContato set geral.Email = email set geral.Logradouro = logradouro set geral.Número = numero set geral.Complemento = complemento set geral.Bairro = bairro set geral.CEP = cep set geral.Cidade = cidade set geral.Estado = uf set geral.MedicoResponsavel = medicoResp set controle={} set controle.CriadoEm = $select(criadoEm="":"",1:$zdate(criadoEm,1)) set controle.CriadoPor = criadoPor set controle.AlteradoEm = $select(alteradoEm="":"",1:$zdate(alteradoEm,1)) set controle.AlteradoPor = alteradoPor set retorno = {} set retorno.geral = geral set retorno.controle = controle write retorno.%ToJSON() quit

Method.name: GetPacientes
Method.Implementation:
set codigo = $get(%request.Data("codigo",1)) do ^WWWVAR
set codigo = $get(%request.Data("codigo",1)) Set take = $Get(%request.Data("take",1)) Set skip = $Get(%request.Data("skip",1)) Set searchValue = $Get(%request.Data("searchValue",1)) set top = take if top<=0 set top = 200 set contador = 0 set SQL = " SELECT Count(*) as totalCount,PatientID, Name,SSN,Gender FROM MEDPatient where company = 0 " if codigo '= "" set SQL = SQL_" and PatientID = '"_codigo_"' " e if searchValue'="" set SQL = SQL_" and (%upper(Name) like %upper('%"_searchValue_"%'))" set meuSelect = "select * from ("_SQL_")" if skip'="" set meuSelect=meuSelect_" where %VID between "_(skip+1)_" and "_(skip+take)_"" set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSelect) set array = [] set Total = 0 while(rs.%Next()){ set PatientID=rs.%Get("PatientID") set Name=rs.%Get("Name") set SSN=rs.%Get("SSN") set Gender=rs.%Get("Gender") set linha = {} set linha.Codigo = PatientID set linha.Descricao = "("_PatientID_") "_Name do array.%Push(linha) } write array.%ToJSON() quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetUFs
Method.Implementation: set codigo = $get(%request.Data("codigo",1)) Set take = $Get(%request.Data("take",1)) Set skip = $Get(%request.Data("skip",1)) Set searchValue = $Get(%request.Data("searchValue",1)) do ^WWWVAR set contador = 0 set SQL = " SELECT SearchItem, Text FROM WWW102 where ParameterDescription='BUNDESLAND' and Country='BR' " if codigo '= "" set SQL = SQL_"and SearchItem = '"_codigo_"'" e if searchValue'="" set SQL = SQL_"where %upper(SearchItem) like %upper('%"_searchValue_"%') or %upper(Text) like %upper('%"_searchValue_"%')" set meuSelect = "select * from ("_SQL_")" if skip'="" set meuSelect=meuSelect_" where %VID between "_(skip+1)_" and "_(skip+take) set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSelect) set array = [] while(rs.%Next()){ set ID=rs.%Get("SearchItem") set Name=rs.%Get("Text") set linha = {} set linha.Codigo = ID set linha.Descricao = Name do array.%Push(linha) } write array.%ToJSON() quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetMedicos
Method.Implementation: set codigo = $get(%request.Data("codigo",1)) Set take = $Get(%request.Data("take",1)) Set skip = $Get(%request.Data("skip",1)) Set searchValue = $Get(%request.Data("searchValue",1)) do ^WWWVAR set contador = 0 set SQL = " SELECT ID1, Name FROM MEDProvider where Company='0'" if codigo '= "" set SQL = SQL_"and ID1 = '"_codigo_"'" e if searchValue'="" set SQL = SQL_"where %upper(Name) like %upper('%"_searchValue_"%') or %upper(ID1) like %upper('%"_searchValue_"%')" set meuSelect = "select * from ("_SQL_")" if skip'="" set meuSelect=meuSelect_" where %VID between "_(skip+1)_" and "_(skip+take) set rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSelect) set array = [] while(rs.%Next()){ set ID=rs.%Get("ID1") set Name=rs.%Get("Name") set linha = {} set linha.Codigo = ID set linha.Descricao = "("_ID_") "_Name do array.%Push(linha) } write array.%ToJSON() quit $$$OK

Method.name: salvarDados
Method.Implementation: do ^WWWVAR tstart set strStatus="" set erro=0 try{ set chave = $get(%request.Data("chave",1)) set dados = $get(%request.Data("dados",1)) if chave="+" set chave = "" set dados = [].%FromJSON(dados) set obj = "" if chave'="" set obj = $get(^MEDPatient(0,chave,1)) set $$$MEDPatientName(obj) = dados.Nome set $$$MEDPatientGender(obj) = dados.Sexo set $$$MEDPatientDOB(obj) = $zdateh($replace(dados.DataDeNascimento,"/","-"),3,,,,,,,"") set $$$MEDPatientSSN(obj) = dados.CPF set $$$MEDPatientFREE7(obj) = dados.RG set $$$MEDPatientExternalCode(obj) = dados.CNS set $$$MEDPatientAllergies(obj) = dados.Alergias set $$$MEDPatientPID(obj) = dados.Prontuário set $$$MEDPatientFREE1(obj) = dados.NãoInformada set $$$MEDPatientFREE9(obj) = dados.Óbito set $$$MEDPatientMothersName(obj) = dados.NomeDaMãe set $$$MEDPatientMothersDOB(obj) = $zdateh($replace(dados.DataDeNasc,"/","-"),3,,,,,,,"") set $$$MEDPatientTel(obj) = dados.Telefone1 set $$$MEDPatientFREE2(obj) = dados.Telefone2 set $$$MEDPatientFREE8(obj) = dados.PerdaDeContato set $$$MEDPatientEmail(obj) = dados.Email set $$$MEDPatientStreet(obj) = dados.Logradouro set $$$MEDPatientFREE4(obj) = dados.Número set $$$MEDPatientFREE3(obj) = dados.Complemento set $$$MEDPatientFREE6(obj) = dados.Bairro set $$$MEDPatientZipCode(obj) = dados.CEP set $$$MEDPatientCity(obj) = dados.Cidade set $$$MEDPatientState(obj) = dados.Estado set $$$MEDPatientMedicoResponsavel(obj) = dados.MedicoResponsavel if chave=""{ set chave = $$GetNextNumber^COMUtils("MEDPatient","") set $$$MEDPatientCreatedDate(obj) = $horolog set $$$MEDPatientCreatedBy(obj) = YBED }else{ set $$$MEDPatientChangedDate(obj) = $horolog set $$$MEDPatientChangedBy(obj) = YBED } set strStatus = $$$Save("MEDPatient",chave,obj,$$$YES) } catch(err){ #dim err as %Exception.SystemException set strStatus = err.DisplayString() set erro=err } set retorno = {} if 'erro{ tcommit set retorno.codigo = chave set retorno.status = strStatus }else{ trollback set retorno.status = strStatus } write retorno.%ToJSON() quit
